00008 UIStarredVersesWidget::UIStarredVersesWidget(boost::shared_ptr<StarredVersesModel> starred_verses_model,
00009                                              QWidget* parent) :
00010     QWidget(parent),
00011     m_starred_verses_view(new QListView()),

00038 void UIStarredVersesWidget::display_verse_text(const QModelIndex& index)
00039 {
00040     boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse_to_display = m_starred_verses_model->get_verse_display(index);
00041     if (verse_to_display->get_verse_id() != -1)
00042         emit verse_display_changed(verse_to_display);
00043 }
